JOB DESCRIPTION: Responsibilities Utilizes all layers of the stack to   design and develop enterprise applications Proficient in designing and   developing high quality Java/Spring Boot microservices Work with the engineering team, project   managers, QA and other team members to translate requirements into actionable   development tasks and user stories  Create unit and integration tests   to fully test and regress software (JUnit, Cucumber etc) Design and develop APIs Work on support tasks as a part of   the site reliability engineering team on a scheduled basis  Optional: Develop Application UI   using web components like HTML and JavaScript frameworks like jQuery and   Angular Qualifications Bachelor's or Masters degree in Computer Science,   Engineering or related field 5+ Years of experience   designing and developing enterprise applications using the full stack and   databases Experience working in an agile   development environment  Experience working on AWS building   SaaS applications Skills 5+ years of hands on experience   with core Java and Spring Boot, Microservices, Java 8 (Multithreading, Design   Patterns, Algorithms & Systems Design) Built services and taken to   production with large scale transactions. 3+ years of hands on experience   with databases like MySQL or similar 3+ years of experience working with   indexing and searching platforms like Solr, Lucene or ElasticSearch Bonus Skills: Experience in Front   end frameworks like JavaScript, jQuery and Angular, HTML5

EDUCATION.UG: B.Sc in Computers, B.Tech/B.E. in Computers, BCA in Computers
EDUCATION.PG: MS/M.Sc(Science) in Computers, MCA in Computers, M.Tech in Computers
